text: create more liveable cities and communities. Overall, active travel aims to create sustainable and healthier transportation options for individuals and communities. In committing to becoming one of the best places to walk and cycle in London, Tower Hamlets can fulfil these aims. 19.26 Physical inactivity is a major cause of disease, and nearly a quarter of Tower Hamletsâ€™ residents do not get the recommended minimum levels of daily physical activity. In addition, encouraging more people to choose active travel will reduce reliance on private vehicles, especially for short journeys, and help to relieve pressure on the public transport network.
